amendment.description: Pursuant to the instructions of the House in the Motion to Recommit the amendment was considered.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Nadler.
